edu.uab.ssg.io.marchini_gwas

Interface Legend

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LegendFile

    public interface Legend
    An abstraction for the "legend" concept and file format required by the HapGen software at http://www.stats.ox.ac.uk/~marchini/software/gwas/hapgen.html. An example of the file format, taken from the ex.leg file in HapGen version 1.3.0, is below:

    rs position 0 1
    rs11089130 14431347 C G
    rs738829 14432618 A G
    rs915674 14433624 A G
    rs915675 14433659 A C
    rs915677 14433758 A G
    rs9604721 14434713 C T
    rs4389403 14435207 A G
    rs5746356 14439734 C T
    rs9617528 14441016 C T
    rs2154787 14449374 C T

    The field delimiter is the space character. Missing data is coded as the hyphen (dash) character. See the HapGen Options section on the -l switch for more detail, including a link to example legend files from HapMap at http://www.hapmap.org/downloads/phasing/2006-07_phaseII/all/. Also see this README.
    Author:
    Jelai Wang

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getAllele0(SNP snp)
      Returns the allele coded as allele 0 at this SNP.
      String getAllele1(SNP snp)
      Returns the allele coded as allele 1 at this SNP.
      List<SNP> getSNPs()
      Returns the SNPs for which this legend provides allele 0 and 1 recodes.
      void write(OutputStream out)
      Writes this legend to the given output stream.
